trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event occurs when a smart tag panel is displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>이 이벤트는 스마트 태그 패널을 표시 하거나 숨길 때 발생 합니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated directly by the panel but rather by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: 패널에서 직접 하지만 대신이 이벤트가 생성 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>클래스 해당 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>및 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>메서드가 실행 됩니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.

For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter always references the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the panel is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>이벤트는 `relatedObject` 매개 변수는 항상 참조는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>패널 연관 된.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the panel.
A value that specifies whether the panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 패널 되 고 있는지 여부를 지정 하는 값에 표시 하거나 숨길입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 인지를 나타내는 스마트 태그 패널이 목록에 표시 하거나 숨길 플래그를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being hidden through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>메서드를이 속성에 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> 값</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> 에 대 한 호출을 통해 패널이 숨겨지는지 되 고

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being shown through a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>이 속성에 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> 값,</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> 호출을 통해는 패널을 표시 하는 경우

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"></xref> that indicates the state of the panel.
Gets the object that is associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: 스마트 태그 패널와 연결 된 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: RelatedObject 속성은 개체 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>클래스</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> 의 인스턴스를 연결 하는 프로그래머의 사용

trans-unit.source: This object then is available to methods that handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체는 다음 처리 하는 메서드를 사용할 수는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>이벤트.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> associated with the smart tag panel.
